Thurs., Sept. 27: Join us as we celebrate civil liberties.
  


Bill of Rights Celebration 2018

Thurs., Sept. 27, 5:30 p.m.
Albuquerque Museum
2000 Mountain Rd NW
Albuquerque, NM 87104

RSVP TODAY
Share this:           

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

This year, as Donald Trump waged war on our Constitution and basic freedoms, brave civil liberties leaders stood up and fought back.

We hope you'll join us as we celebrate the extraordinary contributions of leaders from around the state at our annual Bill of Rights Celebration on Thursday, September 27 at 5:30 p.m. at the Albuquerque Museum. We'll welcome Jeffery Robinson, National ACLU deputy legal director and director of the Trone Center for Justice and Equality. We'll honor this year's award recipients, who have shown remarkable courage in standing up for basic freedoms in New Mexico.

Tickets are going fast and space is limited. Reserve your spot today, and join us as we toast to another year of defending civil liberties.

We hope to see you there,

Peter Simonson
Executive Director
ACLU of New Mexico
